title: Join the community guild
description: Join our guild to get support, be notified of updates or to get some tips and tricks.

title: Donate
description: Support me so I can continue to work on MASZ in my freetime.

title: How it all started
description: I am an administrator of a fairly big german community. The guild is focused on german politics and the german parliament. As you can guess there are many trolls and weird people on those servers. As my moderation team was struggling with keeping track of everything, I started MASZ.

title: MASZ
description: Nowadays MASZ is a feature rich moderation tool that helps not only my moderation team but also other guilds to keep up with those filthy trolls.
